data.name: Default character name
data.descr: Set a default character name that will be used instead of a random name on character creation.

data.name: Auto pickup enabled
data.descr: Enable item auto pickup.  Change pickup rules with the Auto Pickup Manager.

data.name: Auto pickup adjacent
data.descr: If true, will enable to pickup items one tile around to the player. You can assign No Auto Pickup zones with the Zones Manager 'Y' key for e.g. your homebase.

data.name: Auto pickup weight limit
data.descr: Auto pickup items with weight less than or equal to [option] * 50 grams. You must also set the small items option.'0' disables this option

data.name: Auto pickup volume limit
data.descr: Auto pickup items with volume less than or equal to [option] * 50 milliliters.  You must also set the light items option.  '0' disables this option

data.name: Auto pickup safe mode
data.descr: Auto pickup is disabled as long as you can see monsters nearby.  This is affected by 'Safe Mode proximity distance'.

data.name: List items within no auto pickup zones
data.descr: If false, you will not see messages about items, you step on, within no auto pickup zones.

data.name: Additional auto features
data.descr: If true, enables configured auto features below.  Disabled as long as any enemy monster is seen.

data.name: Auto pulp or butcher
data.descr: Action to perform when 'Auto pulp or butcher' is enabled.  Pulp: Pulp corpses you stand on.  - Pulp Adjacent: Also pulp corpses adjacent from you.  - Butcher: Butcher corpses you stand on.

data.name: Auto mining
data.descr: If true, enables automatic use of wielded pickaxes and jackhammers whenever trying to move into mineable terrain.

data.name: Auto foraging
data.descr: Action to perform when 'Auto foraging' is enabled.  Bushes: Only forage bushes.  - Trees: Only forage trees.  - Everything: Forage bushes, trees, and everything else including flowers, cattails etc.

data.name: Dangerous pickups
data.descr: If false, will cause player to drop new items that cause them to exceed the weight limit.

data.name: Dangerous terrain warning prompt
data.descr: Always: You will be prompted to move onto dangerous tiles.  Running: You will only be able to move onto dangerous tiles while running and will be prompted.  Crouching: You will only be able to move onto a dangerous tile while crouching and will be prompted.  Never:  You will not be able to move onto a dangerous tile unless running and will not be warned or prompted.

data.name: Safe mode
data.descr: If true, will hold the game and display a warning if a hostile monster/npc is approaching.

data.name: Safe mode proximity distance
data.descr: If safe mode is enabled, distance to hostiles at which safe mode should show a warning.  0 = Max player view distance.  This option only has effect when no safe mode rule is specified.  Otherwise, edit the default rule in Safe Mode Manager instead of this value.

data.name: Safe mode when driving
data.descr: When true, safe mode will alert you of hostiles while you are driving a vehicle.

data.name: Turns to auto reactivate safe mode
data.descr: Number of turns after which safe mode is reactivated.  Will only reactivate if no hostiles are in 'Safe mode proximity distance.'

data.name: Turns to remember ignored monsters
data.descr: Number of turns an ignored monster stays ignored after it is no longer seen.  0 disables this option and monsters are permanently ignored.

data.name: Realtime turn progression
data.descr: If enabled, monsters will take periodic gameplay turns.  This value is the delay between each turn, in seconds.  Works best with Safe Mode disabled.  0 = disabled.

data.name: Autosave
data.descr: If true, game will periodically save the map.  Autosaves occur based on in-game turns or real-time minutes, whichever is larger.

data.name: Game turns between autosaves
data.descr: Number of game turns between autosaves

data.name: Real minutes between autosaves
data.descr: Number of real time minutes between autosaves

data.name: Auto notes
data.descr: If true, automatically sets notes

data.name: Auto notes (stairs)
data.descr: If true, automatically sets notes on places that have stairs that go up or down

data.name: Auto notes (map extras)
data.descr: If true, automatically sets notes on places that contain various map extras

data.name: Circular distances
data.descr: If true, the game will calculate range in a realistic way: light sources will be circles, diagonal movement will cover more ground and take longer.  If disabled, everything is square: moving to the northwest corner of a building takes as long as moving to the north wall.

data.name: Drop empty containers
data.descr: Set to drop empty containers after use.  No: Don't drop any.  - Watertight: All except watertight containers.  - All: Drop all containers.

data.name: DeathCam
data.descr: Always: Always start deathcam.  Ask: Query upon death.  Never: Never show deathcam.

data.name: Language
data.descr: Switch Language.

data.name: Temperature units
data.descr: Switch between Celsius, Fahrenheit and Kelvin.

data.name: Speed units
data.descr: Switch between mph, km/h and tiles/turn.

data.name: Mass units
data.descr: witch between kg and lbs.

data.name: Volume units
data.descr: Switch between the Cup ( c ), Liter ( L ) or Quart ( qt ).

data.name: Distance units
data.descr: Metric or Imperial

data.name: Time format
data.descr: 12h: AM/PM, e.g. 7:31 AM - Military: 24h Military, e.g. 0731 - 24h: Normal 24h, e.g. 7:31

data.name: Force Y/N in prompts
data.descr: If true, Y/N prompts are case-sensitive and y and n are not accepted.

data.name: Snap to target
data.descr: If true, automatically follow the crosshair when firing/throwing.

data.name: Query on disassembly while butchering
data.descr: If true, will query before disassembling items while butchering.

data.name: Query on keybinding removal
data.descr: If true, will query before removing a keybinding from a hotkey.

data.name: Close advanced inventory on move all
data.descr: If true, will close the advanced inventory when the move all items command is used.

data.name: Open default advanced inventory layout
data.descr: Open default advanced inventory layout instead of last opened layout

data.name: Display actions in Use Item menu
data.descr: "If true, actions ( like \"Read\", \"Smoke\", \"Wrap tighter\" ) will be displayed next to the corresponding items.

data.name: Autoselect if exactly one valid target
data.descr: If true, directional actions ( like "Examine", "Open", "Pickup" ) will autoselect an adjacent tile if there is exactly one valid target.

data.name: Vehicle plating changes part color
data.descr: If true, vehicle parts will change color if they are armor plated

data.name: Auto-shift the view while driving
data.descr: If true, view will automatically shift towards the driving direction

data.name: Draw vehicle facing indicator
data.descr: If true, when controlling a vehicle, a white 'X' at distance 10 from the center will display its current facing.

data.name: Reverse steering direction in reverse
data.descr: If true, when driving a vehicle in reverse, steering should also reverse like real life.

data.name: Sidebar position
data.descr: Switch between sidebar on the left or on the right side.  Requires restart.

data.name: Draw sidebar spacers
data.descr: If true, adds an extra space between sidebar panels.

data.name: Message log flow
data.descr: Where new log messages should show.

data.name: Sidebar log message display duration
data.descr: Number of turns after which a message will be removed from the sidebar log.  '0' disables this option.

data.name: Message cooldown
data.descr: Number of turns during which similar messages are hidden.  '0' disables this option.

data.name: Limit message history
data.descr: Number of messages to preserve in the history, and when saving.

data.name: Suppress "unknown command" messages
data.descr: If true, pressing a key with no set function will not display a notice in the chat log.

data.name: Look around position
data.descr: Switch between look around panel being left or right.

data.name: Pickup position
data.descr: Switch between pickup panel being left, right, or overlapping the sidebar.

data.name: Aim window display style
data.descr: How should confidence and steadiness be communicated to the player.

data.name: Morale style
data.descr: Morale display style in sidebar.

data.name: Full screen Advanced Inventory Manager
data.descr: If true, Advanced Inventory Manager menu will fit full screen, otherwise it will leave sidebar visible.

data.name: Move view offset
data.descr: Move view by how many squares per keypress.

data.name: Overmap fast scroll offset
data.descr: With Fast Scroll option enabled, shift view on the overmap and while looking around by this many squares per keypress.

data.name: Centered menu scrolling
data.descr: If true, menus will start scrolling in the center of the list, and keep the list centered.

data.name: Shift list item view
data.descr: Centered or to edge, shift the view toward the selected item if it is outside of your current viewport.

data.name: Auto inventory letters
data.descr: Enabled: automatically assign letters to any carried items that lack them.  Disabled: do not auto-assign letters.  Favorites: only auto-assign letters to favorited items.

data.name: Show item health bars
data.descr: If true, show item health bars instead of reinforced, scratched etc. text.

data.name: Show item symbols
data.descr: If true, show item symbols in inventory and pick up menu.

data.name: Add ammo to weapon/magazine names
data.descr: If true, the default ammo is added to weapon and magazine names.  For example "Mosin-Nagant M44 (4/5)" becomes "Mosin-Nagant M44 (4/5 7.62x54mm)".

data.name: Animations
data.descr: If true, will display enabled animations.

data.name: Rain animation
data.descr: If true, will display weather animations.

data.name: Projectile animation
data.descr: If true, will display animations for projectiles like bullets, arrows, and thrown items.

data.name: SCT animation
data.descr: If true, will display scrolling combat text animations.

data.name: SCT with Unicode font
data.descr: If true, will display scrolling combat text with Unicode font.

data.name: Animation delay
data.descr: The amount of time to pause between animation frames in ms.

data.name: Force redraw
data.descr: If true, forces the game to redraw at least once per turn.

data.name: Enable ASCII art in item description
data.descr: When available item description will show a picture of the item in ascii art.
